title: Googler-exclusive clear Stadia Controller appears for purchase on eBay, and it even works
content:
A clear colored Stadia Controller – a gift to members of Google’s Stadia team – has appeared in a new eBay listing, and it’s even been modified to be fully functional.

more…

The post Googler-exclusive clear Stadia Controller appears for purchase on eBay, and it even works appeared first on 9to5Google.
